channel.title: codal-nrf52 on micro:bit v2 Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in codal-nrf52 on micro:bit v2 Documentation

item.title: NRF52ADC
item.description: A DMA-enabled analogue to digital converter abstraction, supporting the use of multiplexed DMA/ADC channels.

item.title: NRF52FlashManager
item.description: Interface which provides functions for reading and writing arbitrary portions of attached flash memory. Also provides page and size information.

item.title: NRF52Pin
item.description: Software abstraction of a single pin available to an NRF52 processor. Supports digital and analogue read/write.

item.title: NRF52Serial
item.description: An interface for performing serial over pins on the NRF52, integrated with the CODAL event system.

item.title: NRF52TouchSensor
item.description: A capacitive touch sensor watch class, driven by a low level NRF52 timer. Allows for touch capacitive pins being driven high when pressed.

item.title: NRFLowLevelTimer
item.description: CODAL abstraction for hardware timers available to NRF52 processors.

item.title: License & Attribution
item.description: Licensing and attribution information for the ‘codal-nrf52’ documentation.
